doc:
Jean Peters https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Peters 0 Elizabeth Jean Peters (October 15, 1926 – October 13, 2000) was an American actress. She is known as a star of 20th Century Fox in the late 1940s and early 1950s, and as the third wife of Howard Hughes. Although possibly best remembered for her siren role in Pickup on South Street (1953), Peters was known for her resistance to being turned into a sex symbol. She preferred to play unglamorous, down-to-earth women. Elizabeth_Jean_Peters ( October_15_,_1926 – October_13_,_2000 ) was an_American_actress . She is_known as a_star of 20th_Century_Fox in the_late_1940s and early_1950s , and as the_third_wife of Howard_Hughes . Although possibly_best_remembered for her_siren_role in Pickup on South_Street_(_1953_) , Peters was_known for her_resistance to being_turned into a_sex_symbol . She preferred_to_play unglamorous_,_down-to-earth_women .
